subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Atlanta starter Tom Glavine left with an injury before recording an out, and the host Washington Nationals ended their nine-game losing streak on Sunday by defeating the Braves, 5-4. Glavine (0-1) departed with a strained right hamstring after letting all four batters he faced reach base. As Glavine walked off, he briefly doubled over.
